tasks.name: ish-automation-security-audit
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive security audit and vulnerability assessment of ISH automation system
tasks.prompt: Perform thorough security analysis of the ISH automation project, identify potential vulnerabilities, assess security risks in automation workflows, review credential handling, and provide detailed security recommendations with implementation guidance.

tasks.name: nhs-dental-performance-optimization
tasks.description: Optimize NHS dental site for maximum performance and user experience
tasks.prompt: Analyze and optimize the NHS dental site for peak performance, implement advanced caching strategies, optimize database queries, enhance page load speed, improve mobile responsiveness, and ensure compliance with web accessibility standards.

tasks.name: claude-orchestrator-architecture-enhancement
tasks.description: Enhance Claude orchestrator architecture with advanced features and optimizations
tasks.prompt: Enhance the Claude orchestrator system with improved model assignment algorithms, advanced load balancing, comprehensive monitoring, enhanced error handling, and architectural improvements for scalability and reliability.

tasks.name: android-automation-system-integration
tasks.description: Complete Android automation system integration with advanced device management
tasks.prompt: Complete the Android automation system with comprehensive device management, advanced ADB automation, multi-device support, error recovery mechanisms, performance monitoring, and detailed logging capabilities.

tasks.name: perplexity-honor50-complete-integration
tasks.description: Complete Perplexity Honor 50 integration with full feature implementation
tasks.prompt: Complete the Perplexity Honor 50 integration project by implementing all remaining features, optimizing performance, ensuring reliability, adding comprehensive testing, and creating detailed documentation and user guides.

tasks.name: claude-sidekick-ai-enhancement
tasks.description: Enhance Claude Sidekick with advanced AI capabilities and context awareness
tasks.prompt: Enhance the Claude Sidekick project with improved AI response accuracy, advanced context-aware assistance, better memory management, enhanced user interaction features, and optimized performance.

tasks.name: ishchat-integration-system-completion
tasks.description: Complete ISHChat integration system with robust architecture
tasks.prompt: Complete the ISHChat integration project with robust system architecture, comprehensive error handling, performance optimization, extensive testing, and production-ready deployment configurations.

tasks.name: uk-council-data-enhancement
tasks.description: Enhance UK council sites data with advanced scraping and analysis
tasks.prompt: Enhance the UK council sites collection with advanced scraping techniques, data validation, automated updates, performance optimization, and comprehensive data analysis capabilities.

tasks.name: termux-monitoring-system-optimization
tasks.description: Optimize Termux monitoring system with advanced features and reliability
tasks.prompt: Optimize the Termux monitoring system with real-time advanced alerts, comprehensive reporting dashboard, performance optimizations, custom metrics, and enhanced reliability features.

tasks.name: comprehensive-documentation-overhaul
tasks.description: Complete documentation overhaul with comprehensive guides and API documentation
tasks.prompt: Perform comprehensive documentation overhaul across all projects, create detailed setup guides, API documentation, troubleshooting guides, best practices documentation, and maintain consistency across all project documentation.
